Title: Dawg Days
Plot: Mackey attempts to broker a peace agreement between rival rappers whose feud is spilling into the streets.  Danny is attacked after identifying a shooter, Julien helps a woman whose son's body has been stolen, and Dutch and Claudette search for a mission migrant worker.  Meanwhile, Capt. Aceveda finds a powerful ally in ""Kingmaker"" Jorge Machado.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: John Diehl, Walter Jones, Dex Elliot Sanders, Marc McClure, Mark Kiely, Sticky Fingaz, Efrain Figueroa
